description.para: Constants used to calculate the ability modifier for a skill.

simplesect.para: Use only one of these calculations in your mask! If you use more than one the first will be used.

briefdescription.para: Use the minimum value of the provided ability scores.
Use the maximum value of the provided ability scores.
Use the average value of the provided ability scores.
Use the sum of the provided ability scores.

parameterdescription.para: The skill to check the feat count.

simplesect.para: The count of feats for a specific skill.

briefdescription.para: Returns a skill feat by index.

simplesect.para: Generally used in a loop with NWNX_SkillRanks_GetSkillFeatCountForSkill().

parameterdescription.para: The index in the list of feats for the skill.

briefdescription.para: Modifies or creates a skill feat.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to create if the feat does not exist.

briefdescription.para: Add classes to a skill feat instead of working with the NWNX_SkillRanks_SkillFeat::sClasses string.

detaileddescription.para:
Manipulating the sClasses string in the NWNX_SkillRanks_SkillFeat struct can be difficult. This function allows the builder to enter one class at a time.
skillFeat
The NWNX_SkillRanks_SkillFeat for which the sClasses field will be modifier.
iClass
The class to add to the Skill Feat.
The updated NWNX_SkillRanks_SkillFeat.

briefdescription.para: Change the modifier value for Skill Focus and Epic Skill Focus feats.

detaileddescription.para:
The stock modifier on Skill Focus and Epic Skill Focus are 3 and 10 respectively, these can be changed with this function.
iModifier
The new value for the feat modifier.
iEpic
Set to TRUE to change the value for Epic Skill Focus.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current penalty to Dexterity based skills when blind.

simplesect.para: The penalty to Dexterity when blind.

briefdescription.para: Set the value the Dexterity based skills get decreased due to blindness.

parameterdescription.para: The penalty to Dexterity when blind.

briefdescription.para: Get a skill modifier for an area.

simplesect.para: The modifier to that skill in the area.

briefdescription.para: Sets a skill modifier for the area.

parameterdescription.para: The modifier to the skill in the area.
